statements: DELETE FROM feedback_reviews WHERE attendee_id = 100 AND festival_id = 200;
DELETE FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 10 AND attendee_id = 5;
DELETE FROM reviews WHERE review_date < '2022-01-01' AND attendee_id = 10;
DELETE FROM improvements WHERE implemented = false;
DELETE FROM review WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM improvements WHERE festival_name = 'Music Fest';
DELETE FROM improvements WHERE suggestion LIKE '%improve%' AND festival_name = 'Music Festival';
